<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=340) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 138 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=333)

</column>

---

You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures. Add the forms listed in [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list. Whenever you’re polymorphed into another form using _wild shape_, you gain resistance 5 to your choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison.

<title level="2">Dragon Shape leads to...</title>
[Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1718), [True Shapeshifter](/Feats.aspx?ID=355)
name: Dragon Shape
